rules_text:
When Icoatl River Stalker enters the battlefield, if its ambush cost was paid, each attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Ambush {4}{U} [i](You may cast this spell as though it had flash for its ambush cost as long as a creature is attacking you. If you do, this creature enters the battlefield blocking an attacking creature if able.)[/i]
